text: [Music]
English grammar level - a program to
master the difficult rules in English
grammar
brought to you by let's talk Institute
for English language and finishing
skills kinds of adjectives we all know
what is an adjective
let's learn kinds of adjectives
adjectives are of five kinds they are
adjectives of quality quantity number
demonstration and interrogation
adjectives of quality adjectives of
quality sure the kind or quality of a
person or a thing for example he is an
honest man in this example the adjective
honest describes the quality of Mahatma
Gandhi some more examples Mumbai is a
large city the foolish old crow tried to
sing adjectives of quality answer the
question of what kind adjectives of
quality are also called descriptive
adjectives adjectives of quantity
adjectives of quantity shows how much of
a thing is meant for example he has lost
all his wealth in this example all is
adjectives of quantity which describes
the quantity of wealth or money the man
lost some more examples
he showed much patience
I ate some rice adjectives of quantity
will answer the question how much
adjectives of number adjectives of
number shows how many persons or things
are meant or in what order a person or
thing stands for example the hand has
five fingers in this example five is an
adjective of number as it indicates the
number of fingers the hand has some more
examples most boys like cricket there
are no pictures
in the book here are some ripe mangoes
adjectives of number will answer the
question how many demonstrative
adjectives demonstrative adjectives
point out which person or thing is meant
for example this boy is stronger than
John in this example the demonstrative
adjective this points the boy in the
picture is stronger than John some more
examples don't be in such a hurry I hate
such things demonstrative adjectives
will answer the question which
interrogative adjective words like what
which and whose when used with nouns to
ask questions are called interrogative
adjectives for example which way shall
we go in this example the adjectives
which is asking a question in which
direction to go some more examples what
color is this
whose electronic book is this note what
is used in a general sense and which in
a selective sense this was a
demonstration video for English grammar
level two for complete program visit us
at let's talk company dot in if you
liked this video kindly put your
comments right below this video for more
videos you can subscribe to our YouTube
channel by clicking the subscribe button
just above this video thank you for
watching us take care
[Music]
